Package edu.luc.cs.trull.task

Provides support for representing ongoing, autonomous activities as Trull components.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Task An abstraction of a piece of work that can be broken up into discrete steps.
TaskFactory A function from events to tasks.
 

Class Summary
AbstractTaskWorker A Worker for the step-by-step execution of a Task using an Executor.
DefaultTaskWorker A Worker for the step-by-step execution of a Task using Trull's default scheduling mechanism.
PooledTaskWorker A Worker that uses a multi-threaded PooledExecutor to perform its Task.
QueuedTaskWorker A Worker that uses a single-threaded QueuedExecutor to perform its Task.
RunnableTask An adapter for using a Runnable as a one-step Task.
 

Package edu.luc.cs.trull.task Description

Provides support for representing ongoing, autonomous activities as Trull components. Such activities usually have one or more internal threads.
